Title: Relates to housing navigation services for those with intellectual and developmental disabilities
Summary: Establishes a curriculum and task force to provide housing navigation services for those with intellectual and developmental disabilities.
LawCode: Add ยง13.44, amd ยง5.07, Ment Hyg L; amd ยง366, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law and the social services law, in relation to housing navigation services for those with intellectual and developmental disabilities
